EmailTemplate.subject: Meet the Honeywell HGuide Team at Intergeo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Receive a FREE three-day pass to Intergeo 2019 (€120 savings), when you contact us here <[[mailto:jeremy.dingman@honeywell.com]]> before September 1.
At the show, visit us at booth L1.039 to see our newest HGuide inertial sensors and navigators, meet with one of our team members or get a product demo.
To schedule a meeting with one of our HGuide product specialists, please select a time from the link below.
SCHEDULE A MEETING <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/TPHYRNN]]>
